sense.name: Replace or exchange one with another
sense.examples: The con artist interchanged the original with a fake Rembrandt. Interchange regular milk with fat free milk. Interchange this screw for one of a smaller size. Synonyms can be interchanged without changing the context's meaning. We have been interchanging letters for years. They interchanged guitars. She interchanged gold and silver beads in the bracelet.

sense.name: Reverse course
sense.examples: The tide interchanged to work against him. She interchanged and headed west. Public opinion interchanged when they heard of the scandal. The trend was interchanged due to the economic climate.
